description: Baby steps to master all needed skills
name: Tutorial

levels.description: Learn how to move around, change between characters, use windows, doors and exit the zone
levels.name: Break in

levels.description: When a camera sees you, the alarm is triggered, learn how to avoid being seen
levels.name: Cameras

levels.description: There are more cameras, but each system operates over another system. Use the fusebox to turn them off
levels.name: De Fuse It

levels.description: There is a safebox try to open it by ticking right and left. Once is unlocked, open it to get your loot
levels.name: Is it safe?

levels.description: It's time to polish those hacker skills, hack the computer and get some loot
levels.name: Ping pong

levels.description: There is one guard patrolling try to not get caught
levels.name: Guards!
